column1: VICTORIA, B.C. – The total number of confirmed cases of the coronavirus in the Northern Health Region now stands at 46 and 34 new cases were confirmed across the province, bringing British Columbia’s total to 2,087 as announced by Health Officials https://www.energeticcity.ca/2020/04/46-total-cases-of-covid-19-in-northern-health-region-34-new-cases-in-bc/
